snippet: The latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted March 7 through 11 with 1,009 adults throughout the United States. Of these, 1,009 said they were registered to vote.
lead_paragraph: The latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted March 7 through 11 with 1,009 adults throughout the United States. Of these, 1,009 said they were registered to vote.
